Latest Posts

  • Sdet

    SDET is the most trending role when it comes to Automation Testers. If you look into Job Description of an SDET in any company they would ask for expertise in atleast two major programming languages. SDET is not less than a developer. You should know how to write optimised code, build frameworks, deploy code efficiently.

  • Frameworks

    Frameworks are the core of any application. Test automation frameworks are almost equal with a web application framework.

    This is one of my blogs which is aimed for beginners + Intermediate level Automation testers.
